feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX6][Network] - Network equipment maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 24, 08:00 - 12:00 UTC

Jan 5, 02:46 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 24/02/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 24/02/2024 12:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will have to carry out interventions on a network equipment.

entry.title: [RBX2][Dedicated Servers] - Racks 31B25/31B26/31B27/31B28
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 13, 23:00 UTC  -  Feb 14, 06:00 UTC

Jan 5, 04:13 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 13/02/2024 23:00 UTC
End time : 14/02/2024 06:00 UTC

entry.title: [RBX8][Storage and Backups] - NAS HA maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 17, 13:00 - 15:00 UTC

Jan 9, 22:04 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 17/01/2024 13:00 UTC
End time : 17/01/2024 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will perform an update on the storage servers hosting your data.
This version will improve certain security mechanisms, as well as some performance enhancements.
During the maintenance period, your data will remain available.

entry.title: [RBX4/RBX6/RBX7/RBX8/BHS1/BHS4/BHS5/BHS6/BH7][Dedicated Servers] - Boot Firmware Maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 17, 10:00 - 10:59 UTC

Jan 4, 17:23 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 17/01/2024 10:00 UTC
End time : 17/01/2024 10:59 UTC
Service impact : This maintenance affect reboots to disk or in rescue mode for servers running very old hardware
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our servers, we will be changing the boot firmware of legacy boot servers in RBX4, RBX6, RBX7, RBX8, BHS1, BHS4, BHS5, BHS6, and BHS7 from SYSLINUX to iPXE.
